Enter the parent PIN to access Safety and Settings
Use your fingerprint or face to unlock the wallet

Too many failed attempts. Try again later
Создадете шифрирана резервна копија на вашиот паричник за да се заштитите од губење или грешка на уредот. Неопходно за враќање на паричникот.
Вратете го вашиот паричник од претходно креирана резервна копија. Корисно при поставување на нов уред или враќање од проблеми.
Важни безбедносни насоки и најдобри практики за безбедно користење на вашиот Dogecoin паричник. Прочитајте пред складирање значајни износи.
Техничка документација за архитектурата на паричникот, функциите и деталите за имплементација за напредни корисници.
Report bugs or issues with the wallet
App version, license, and developer information
Enter original text or file hash:
Are you sure you want to delete this recurring payment?
No private key available for signing
The payee (%1$s) is using an incompatible payment protocol (reason: %2$s).
To protect your privacy, your address will change once it receives a payment.
If you don\'t see an update, this probably means your version of Android isn\'t supported any more.
Your name or your company\'s name, to be added to payment requests you issue to your customers.
There is no web browser installed to open the external document.
The amount of tiny payments in your wallet doesn\'t add up to a sendable value.
Your payment was successfully sent directly.
Remember your balance of %s will be lost if you uninstall the Dogecoin Wallet app without sending it away first.

You are about to sweep a paper wallet or coupon. This will move all coins from that paper to your wallet on this device. When the transaction is confirmed, the paper will be worthless and should not be re-used for safety reasons.
Hint: to increase the safety of your wallet, you can <u>encrypt your device</u>. This also protects data of other apps.
Please enter a valid IP address or hostname. If you have Tor set up, you can use an onion address here, too.
Guava, a collection of useful helpers
Tip: This wallet works best if you don’t use it for lots of tiny transactions. Too many small inputs can slow things down and make your coins take longer to show up.
This payment was delayed because the sender used an insecure transaction type.
View current exchange rates for Dogecoin
This amount is quite high for carrying in your pocket. Please move some to a safer place.
After a couple of weeks of not being used, the app will notify if there are still coins in the wallet.
Low data usage: Use network filtering to read only transactions relevant to your wallet. It will use about 500 MB per month, but will disclose the filter to the network.
This payment has been received directly. There is a risk it might never become spendable.
You received %1$s to unsecure addresses. Would you like to move these coins to secure addresses? A small network fee of %2$s will be paid.
A priority fee of %s will be paid. If you care about low fees, use \'priority\' only if you need confirmation as soon as possible.
External block explorer to use for browsing transactions, addresses and blocks.
This payment has an increased risk of being reversed by the sender! If you can, wait for confirmation.
Start by scanning the private key of a paper wallet. Use the camera action button.

Your device\'s Bluetooth component is vulnerable. Your Dogecoins on this device are at risk, regardless of the app you\'re using to store them!\n\nWe suggest to switch off Bluetooth immediately and check with your device manufacturer for an Android OS update that implements security patch level \'%s\' or later.
Your wallet is protected by a spending PIN. Make sure you remember the PIN in addition to the backup password!
If you don\'t care about your coins, you could also donate them to the Dogecoin Wallet project.
Do you want to pay with all you have?
The amount is too small to send.
You\'ve got a bad connection to the Electrum network.
This payment pays to many wallets besides yours, which makes the app slow down over time. If you can, try receiving payments which pay only to you.
The amount of coins in the wallet is too small for sweeping.
Your wallet was successfully restored. Its balance will be determined next. This will take some time.

Improved privacy: Will not disclose any information about your wallet to the network. Be aware that because all transactions are read, this will use a hefty 10 GB per month. Before using this please check your data allowance.
A network fee of %s will be paid.
In order to scan QR codes, you need to grant permission to use the camera.
You can specify multiple trusted peers by separating them with a space character.
Please back up your wallet\nbefore receiving any Dogecoins!
When the payment is made, the send dialog will close automatically.
Your payment was successful. It has reached the payee.
Due to maintenance on the Dogecoin network, this transaction should not be trusted until it is fully confirmed.
Your device is old and insecure. Please only use for small amounts.
The Dogecoin network is undergoing maintenance. You\'re advised to not send or receive any coins until maintenance is finished. <u>More information.</u>

Paper wallets are most commonly used for cold storage. Some ATMs print them on their paper slip rather than sending the coins to your mobile device directly. People sometimes use pre-charged paper wallets to pass value around (not recommended).
Choose between low data usage and improved privacy when synchronizing with the network.
Send payment directly to the payee.
This payment has been credited to your wallet.
Have you really read the safety notes? Did you already back up your wallet to a safe place?
The network fee of this payment can\'t be raised.
Your payment will still be broadcasted via the P2P network.
The confirmation of this payment is delayed, likely due to an overload of the Dogecoin network.
Currently payments are not possible because a replay is in progress.
This private key is protected with a password.
This transaction raises the network fee for a previous payment.
Important: You need to remember your PIN! Do not use common numbers (like birthdates).
No suitable cloud storage provider is installed.\nYou need something like \"Nextcloud\" or \"Google Drive\".
You\'re about to send to yourself!
Monitor network status and peer connections
Warning: Your wallet is protected by a spending PIN. Make sure you still remember it before you receive to this wallet.
Show options to disable or enable specific notifications.
You are about to replace your current wallet. Any coins in the current wallet will be lost unless you\'ve got a separate backup of that.

Unfortunately Android is preventing the automatic detection of your device\'s Bluetooth address. You need to look it up in the Android Bluetooth settings and enter it here.\n\nPlease make sure that every character is correct. Colons can be omitted, and case is not important.
Do you want to raise the network fee of this payment by %s? It will make the payment confirm quicker.
Not enough available coins. You\'re missing %s. This may also be due to the network fee.
An economic fee of %s will be paid. Important: Use \'economic\' only if you don\'t care about confirmation time.
Ready to receive payments via Bluetooth
This is your current address for receiving.
Manually configure your own Bluetooth address so you can receive payments from payers without connectivity.
Your payment was rejected via direct connection.
You\'ve still got Dogecoins on this device!
View the extended public key of your wallet, so it can be imported into other apps and services. Be careful: doing so will disclose your monetary privacy to that app.
Important: Do not load private keys from dubious sources! Others can gain control over your funds if you do.
The scanned address is your own.
Frequently asked questions about the app
The network fee for this payment (%1$s) is high in relation to the amount (%2$s). Do you want to send anyway?
Accept payment via Bluetooth for more reliable processing
Spending from your wallet will be protected with the chosen PIN.
Add a child to get started
Enter a PIN code to protect access to Safety and Settings when child mode is active.
Are you sure you want to deactivate child mode? This will revert the wallet to normal mode and remove the derived key.
